title: Code Generation
body:
Code generation (CG) is the future for software developers. If you are a software developer like myself and have been writing code for over 10 years and you haven't written tools to help you generate code. I strongly advise you to invest some time in writing simple tools that will generate code for you.

This will do the following for you

  • speed up your development
  • allow you focus on the juicy bits of your project, rather than writing boring code like database models, repositories etc
  • make your code consistent
  • if you are a freelancer, it will allow you take on more projectsÂ as you move with blazing speed

In the future, I will shed some more light on the CG tools that I have built for myself and frameworks I have developed for working on web projects

Until then, have a productive day and never stop learning!
